title: HOUR 2- Chris Fowler Sep 11, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Chris Fowler Sep 11, 2020
description:
Chris Fowler says he did not cover Mahomes while he was at Texas Tech. Chris says that Texas Tech was just on the fringe of being on the college game of the week, but Chris says he wished he would have covered Mahomes when he was in college.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Chris Fowler says he did not cover Mahomes while he was at Texas Tech. Chris says that Texas Tech was just on the fringe of being on the college game of the week, but Chris says he wished he would have covered Mahomes when he was in college.
